code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./RoomCode.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RoomCode(){const[roomCode,setRoomCode]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const validateRoomCode=id=>{const isValid=/^\d{4}$/.test(id);setError(isValid?'':'Неверный код комнаты');return isValid;};const handleChange=event=>{setRoomCode(event.target.value);setError('');};const handleSubmit=()=>{if(validateRoomCode(roomCode)){alert(`Проверка успешна!
